structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 71, effective January 1, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 269, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 8, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1949 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 17. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4149b-6.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Omitted tax bills, when due and when deemed delinquent -- Penalty -- Laws applicable to delinquency.
